title: Find Formal Social Events Nearby
task: Check for nearby social events that fit a formal and polite style
summary: As an older adult, I want to ask ALFRED to find only formal social events that respect my privacy, so I feel safe and comfortable.

title: User Initiated Communication Only
task: Choose to initiate communication with family or friends without prompts
summary: As an older adult, I want to control all communications and allow ALFRED to send messages only when I agree, so I avoid unwanted contact.

title: Measured Voice Commands Only
task: Speaks in a measured tone to give commands to ALFRED
summary: As an older person, I want to give ALFRED commands only when I choose, so I can avoid feeling rushed or overwhelmed.

title: Block New Features and Data Sharing
task: Prevents any new features or data sharing from being added to ALFRED
summary: As an older person, I want to stop new features and never share my data, so I can keep full privacy and control without stress.

title: Block Sharing Health Data
task: Refuses to share health data with family, friends, or caregivers
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to never share my health data with anyone, including family, friends, caregivers, or doctors, to keep my information fully private and safe.

title: Strict Data Privacy Control
task: Maintains strict privacy by ensuring no personal data leaves her device
summary: As an older adult, I want to keep my personal data only on my device to protect my privacy.

title: Concise Responses Only
task: Wants clear, concise responses from ALFRED without extra details
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to give very short and simple answers, so I am not confused or stressed.

title: Start Daily Cognitive Game on Request
task: Commands ALFRED to start the daily cognitive game
summary: As an older adult, I want to play cognitive games only when I choose, so I do not feel forced or stressed.

title: Slow and Simple Memory Games
task: Prefers slow-paced and simple memory matching games
summary: As an older adult, I want to do simple and slow memory activities, but I can try more challenging games when I feel ready.

title: Arrange Visits Offline Only
task: Prefers to arrange social visits offline rather than through ALFRED
summary: As an older person, I want to arrange social visits in person and limit digital contact when I prefer, to keep control of my interactions.

title: View Vital Signs on Demand
task: Asks ALFRED to show her vital signs from wearable sensors
summary: As an older person, I want to see my vital signs only when I ask, so I keep full control of my privacy and avoid any unwanted alerts.

title: Ignore Unwanted Hydration Reminders
task: Ignores reminders she finds unnecessary, like hydration alerts
summary: As an older person, I want to block almost all hydration reminders because I do not want many notifications and I want to control my own routine.

title: Schedule Nurse Check-ins in Advance
task: Arranges check-ins with her nurse in advance
summary: As an older person, I want to arrange nurse check-ins only at home during hospital work hours, so I keep control and avoid surprise visits.

title: In-Home Check-Ins Only
task: Insists that check-ins happen in her home, not remotely
summary: As an older person, I want to arrange my check-ups at home or hospital hours, so I feel safe and keep control of visits.

title: Show Vital Signs Only on Request
task: Requests to see vital signs data explicitly, avoiding unsolicited alerts
summary: As an older person, I want to see my vital signs only when I ask, so I control my privacy and avoid all unwanted alerts.

title: Full Control of Privacy and Data Sharing
task: Feels reassured by control over privacy and data sharing
summary: As an older person, I want to block all sharing of my health and personal data, so that my information stays completely private and safe.

title: Formal Slow Speech Daily Briefing
task: Speaks slowly and formally to ALFRED to initiate daily briefing
summary: As an older adult I want to speak slowly and formally with ALFRED, so I feel safe and keep control.

title: Review Health Data Privately
task: Reviews her latest health readings on ALFRED without sharing them
summary: As an older person, I want to review my health data only by myself without sharing it with anyone, so I can keep full control and feel safe.

title: Strict Privacy Setup with Minimal Notifications
task: Configures ALFRED to have strict privacy settings during initial setup
summary: As an older person, I want my data to stay private unless I agree, with few notifications to feel safe.
